forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 62. Northeast wind 12 to 16 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 45. Northeast wind 9 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun arcs into the crisp autumn sky above Boston, today offers the promise of a clear, sun-drenched day. With gentle breezes flowing from the northeast, the air crisply nips at your skin, a refreshing contrast to the warm embrace of the late summer days now fading into memory. It's a fine morning, perfect for an invigorating walk along the Charles River or perhaps a leisurely stroll through one of the city’s bountiful parks, where fallen leaves crunch underfoot, reminding one of the season's change.

As daylight wanes, the evening presents a tranquil calm, with mostly clear skies settling into a serene blue, inviting the quiet of the night. A light jacket will serve you well as the temperatures dip down, wrapping around you just enough to ward off the chill. With nothing but a light breeze whispering through the streets, there's an opportunity for small delight in simple pleasures—a sip of warm cider at a neighborhood café or an impromptu gathering with friends under the stars. Today, Boston sparkles subtly, beckoning residents to savor its understated beauty amidst the bustling vibrance of the city.
